com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap

Class AbstractLDAPServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.AbstractServer
      • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.AbstractLDAPServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LDAPServer, com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server

    public abstract class AbstractLDAPServer
extends com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.AbstractServer
implements LDAPServer
    Abstract base class for LDAPServer implementations.
    Since:
    1.1.1
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.LDAPServer

        AUTH_DN, LDAP_PORT, LDIF_FILE, OBJECT_CLASSES, PASSWD, ROOT, WORK_DIR

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(String name, Object value, com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger logger)
      Used to configure the root DN of the LDAP directory, the working directory used by the directory service to store the directory data, the LDIF file used to seed the directory or the TCP port number on which the server will listening for LDAP traffic.
      String getAuthDn()
      Get the distinguished name of the admin account.
      File getLdifFile()
      Get the LDIF file that contains the data used to seed the directory.
      String[] getObjectClasses()
      Get the object classes used to create the directory root.
      String getPasswd()
      Get the password for the admin account.
      String getRoot()
      Get the configured directory root.
      int getServerPort()
      Get the port on which the LDAP server is listening.
      File getWorkingDirectory()
      Get the working directory used to create temporary files.

      • Methods inherited from class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.AbstractServer

        isStarted, isStopped, start, stop

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from interface com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server
